# robots.txt for CoWorkMy
# This file tells search engine crawlers which pages they can and cannot request from your site.

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /auth/
Disallow: /dashboard/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /spaces
Allow: /booking
Allow: /legal/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://coworkmy.com/sitemap.xml
